House of Three

How do you offer your expertise when there isn't enough time in the day?

In today's demanding digital world, it can be nearly impossible for business owners to maintain their digital presence and serve their clients.

Company Profile

House of Three is a BCIN-licensed architectural technology firm in Ontario, Canada that provides custom plans for innovative functionality and lasting, unique designs.

Content Writing

Each month I sit down with president and leader designer Lisa Henderson and turn her expert knowledge into entertaining and digestible content for readers.

The goal of this project is to drive organic traffic and establish House of Three as an authority in this space. Articles range from tips on planning your new cottage, home, or home office, to building greener on a budget. To date, this project has been my most successful.

House of Three is a perfect example of how quickly you can see success with a great website, interesting content, and a bit of dedication.

Client

House of Three

Agency

Working alongside the digital marketing experts at: Major Impact

Content Writing

I write SEO-friendly blog posts for House of Three that are published the first of each month. There are a few samples below, though they may not be the most recent.
